name: Arc Defense
description:
Simple retro-style space game, where you use an arc beam and radial blasts to protect your mothership from the enemy fleets. 

Game Controls:

  • Click or hold left-click  to rotate your ship, changing the angle of the arc shield.  
  • Press space button  to unleash a radial blast that destroys all jets in the area. Be careful, because it has a short cooldown!

Alternatively, A and D keys can be used to rotate or left-click to radial blast to make the game a full keyboard or full mouse experience. 

Main Features:

  • 3 types of enemy fighter jets - more planned for the future including a boss fight.
  • 2 game difficulties - easy and hard (easy is recommended for first playthrough).
  • Fleet raids - enemy spawn rate increases as you fend off a prepared attack.

Credits:

  • Game and graphics by SirVulpix.
  • Sound effects and music by Migben21.

Game, graphics and music is entirely original.

Created for the fireside jam 2022, under the theme 'protect', using the Love2D framework. Try downloading if web version doesn't work.
